messages.title: Why we are backing John Cryer
messages.content: John is a hardworking, straightforward guy who gets the job done. He regularly attends our community events and is always willing to stand up and speak out for Leyton and Wanstead...

messages.title: Just 5 of the things Labour will do...
messages.content: A Labour government will build a strong economic foundation with a fairer tax system. A Labour government will create jobs for young people...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour government will build a strong economic foundation with a fairer tax system.
A Labour government will create jobs for young people.
A Labour government will cap class sizes for 5, 6, and 7 year-olds.
A Labour government will provide 50,000 new homes for first-time buyers under 25.
A Labour government will freeze gas and electricity bills until 2017.

mentions.candidate: John is...always willing to stand up and speak out for Leyton and Wanstead.

issues.economy: A Labour government will build a strong economic foundation with a fairer tax
issues.education: A Labour government will cap class sizes for 5, 6, and 7 year-olds.

housing.content: A Labour government will provide 50,000 new homes for first-time buyers under 25.

issues.environment: A Labour government will freeze gas and electricity bills until 2017.

endorsements.endorsement: I'll be voting Labour in May, to ensure that we have five more years of an MP who cares about Leyton and Wanstead.
That's why I'll be supporting John and voting Labour.
I'll be voting Labour in May to make sure that John is re-elected as our MP to help kick out the Tories.

images.caption: John in the fight against the Tories
